text: Ko onon yo ɓiɗɓe Aadama! Wata seytaane fitinir on wano o yaltinirnoo baabiraaɓe mon ɓen ka Aljanna, himo ɓoora e maɓɓe conci maɓɓe ɗin fii yo hollu ɓe awraaji maɓɓe ɗin. Pellet, himo reeni on kanko e gorol makko ngol nokku ka on yi'ataa ɓe. Menen Men waɗii seytaaneeji ɗin weldiiɗi ɓen ɓen gomɗintaa
